programme.title: Insane Pools: Off the Deep End
programme.desc: Documentary following award-winning pool designer Lucas Congdon as he turns high and dry homes into exotic waterfront properties through grand, nature-inspired designs to encourage his clients to rediscover their love of the outdoors. The crew turns a koi pond project into a backyard oasis for a family in Siesta Key, and later transforms an old pool into a natural lagoon

programme.title: Lone Star Law
programme.desc: Warden Marshall leads a poaching investigation, Richards visits an illegal snake breeder and Gould and Hickerson try to save an injured pelican

programme.title: Dr Jeff: Rocky Mountain Vet
programme.desc: A dog needs emergency treatment after being shot in a home invasion. Dr Jeff and Hector treat wolves at a Colorado wildlife sanctuary

programme.title: Treehouse Masters
programme.desc: Pete is in New Yorks Catskill Mountains to construct a glasshouse in the sky, using his clients collection of 50 vintage windows

programme.title: Alaska: Surviving the Last Frontier
programme.desc: Following four groups of ordinary people as they travel into the wilderness of Alaska, where they must find a new home in the inhospitable environment and deal with the threat posed by bears, glaciers and their own fears

programme.desc: Otto and August are on a risky quest for a huge crane. Charlotte, Eivin, and Eve fight the tide to rescue a cow. And, Atz Lee and Jane go kayak fishing

programme.title: Mountain Monsters

programme.title: A Garden in Snowdonia
programme.desc: Garden supervisor Adam Salvin restores an impressive Italianate terrace to its former glory at Bodnant Garden in north Wales, while Dave Larter shares his passion for giant lilies. The show also examines the world-famous laburnum arch in full bloom

programme.title: Canal Boat Diaries
programme.desc: Narrowboater Robbie Cumming begins a 170-mile journey across the north of England. However, he soon runs into difficulty when he encounters a propeller problem in Wigan and runs aground in Blackburn. Nevertheless, he pushes on to navigate a true wonder of the waterways, the Burnley Embankment

programme.title: Archaeology: A Secret History
programme.desc: Richard Miles continues his series charting the history of archaeological breakthroughs by looking at how discoveries in the 18th and 19th centuries overturned previously formed ideas of when and where civilisation began, as empires competed to make their beliefs prevalent

programme.title: Thatcher: A Very British Revolution
programme.desc: A look at how Margaret Thatcher and her government sought to transform the British economy with far-reaching consequences, while tensions surfaced amongst her closest allies as she tried to improve her public image and events revealed that the Iron Lady had emotional vulnerabilities in relation to her family

programme.title: Margaret
programme.desc: Lindsay Duncan stars as Margaret Thatcher in this one-off drama charting the former prime ministers final days in office. In November 1990, deputy prime minister Geoffrey Howe resigns with a speech in which he urges his fellow Conservative Party members to consider their loyalty to Mrs Thatcher. A leadership challenge is announced, but the Iron Lady refuses to take it seriously - unaware her premiership will be over just nine days later. Ian McDiarmid portrays loyal husband Denis, with Geoffrey Howe, Michael Heseltine and Kenneth Clarke played by John Sessions, Oliver Cotton and Kevin R McNally

programme.title: How to Get Ahead
programme.desc: Writer and broadcaster Stephen Smith explores the flamboyant court of French monarch Louis XIV at the Palace of Versailles, where he surrounded himself with aristocrats, artists, interior designers, gardeners, wig-makers, chefs and musicians. Ambitious courtiers scrambled to get closer to the king, but the bedchamber seemed to provide a more unseemly path to power

programme.title: A Garden in Snowdonia
programme.desc: Garden supervisor Adam Salvin restores an impressive Italianate terrace to its former glory at Bodnant Garden in north Wales, while Dave Larter shares his passion for giant lilies. The show also examines the world-famous laburnum arch in full bloom

programme.title: Canal Boat Diaries
programme.desc: Narrowboater Robbie Cumming begins a 170-mile journey across the north of England. However, he soon runs into difficulty when he encounters a propeller problem in Wigan and runs aground in Blackburn. Nevertheless, he pushes on to navigate a true wonder of the waterways, the Burnley Embankment

programme.title: Archaeology: A Secret History
programme.desc: Richard Miles continues his series charting the history of archaeological breakthroughs by looking at how discoveries in the 18th and 19th centuries overturned previously formed ideas of when and where civilisation began, as empires competed to make their beliefs prevalent

programme.title: Thatcher: A Very British Revolution
programme.desc: A look at how Margaret Thatcher and her government sought to transform the British economy with far-reaching consequences, while tensions surfaced amongst her closest allies as she tried to improve her public image and events revealed that the Iron Lady had emotional vulnerabilities in relation to her family

programme.title: A Garden in Snowdonia
programme.desc: Troy Scott continues to struggle with his task of maintaining one of the largest rhododendron collections in the country. However, Bodnant Garden faces greater trouble as reports arrive about a fast-spreading oak disease

programme.title: Canal Boat Diaries
programme.desc: Narrowboater and film-maker Robbie Cumming crosses the Pennines on the picturesque Leeds and Liverpool Canal, and lends a hand to hire boaters in Gargrave, North Yorkshire. He also encounters Bingley Five Rise Locks, a wonder of the inland waterways

programme.title: Close Encounters of the Third Kind
programme.desc: An electrical repairman sees a fleet of UFOs and develops an increasing fascination with mountain-shaped forms, driving his wife to despair. Meanwhile, a single mother has a similar fixation after her son mysteriously vanishes, and a team of scientists investigates a series of strange events around the world. Eventually, they are all drawn to a mountain where aliens are about to make contact. Steven Spielbergs sci-fi drama, starring Richard Dreyfuss, Francois Truffaut and Teri Garr

programme.title: The Haunting
programme.desc: Psychic researchers gather at a supposedly haunted house to investigate its evil reputation, and find themselves facing their deepest fears as they confront the unknown forces prowling its corridors. Horror, starring Claire Bloom, Richard Johnson, Julie Harris and Russ Tamblyn

programme.title: Hauntings
programme.desc: Documentary examining paranormal activity, beginning with he Enfield Poltergeist, a series of strange events that occured at a council house in north London in 1977. Police were called to investigate reports of a burglary, but found no evidence of a break-in, but heard rapping on the walls, saw furniture tilt independently and a chair slide several metres across the room on its own. These were the first of many extraordinary events recorded on film and audio tape, culminating in disembodied voices and levitation

programme.title: Hauntings
programme.desc: A look at what occurred when Andrea Perron moved into her new home in Rhode Island with her parents and four sisters, with the previous occupants seemingly in a hurry to leave. Soon, the Perrons were experiencing multiple disturbances, hearing whispers and seeing visions prompting Andreas mother to seek help from ghost-hunters Ed and Lorraine Warren. Their investigations led to a seance, which changed the lives of the Perron family

programme.title: A Garden in Snowdonia
programme.desc: Troy Scott continues to struggle with his task of maintaining one of the largest rhododendron collections in the country. However, Bodnant Garden faces greater trouble as reports arrive about a fast-spreading oak disease

programme.title: Canal Boat Diaries
programme.desc: Narrowboater and film-maker Robbie Cumming crosses the Pennines on the picturesque Leeds and Liverpool Canal, and lends a hand to hire boaters in Gargrave, North Yorkshire. He also encounters Bingley Five Rise Locks, a wonder of the inland waterways

programme.title: Blood and Gold: The Making of Spain with Simon Sebag Montefiore
programme.desc: The historian examines Spains Golden Age under Philip II through to the Spanish Civil War and dictatorship under Franco, from which Spain has emerged as a modern democratic monarchy

programme.title: Breakfast
programme.desc: A round-up of national and international news, plus current affairs, arts and entertainment, and weather

programme.title: Morning Live
programme.desc: Gethin Jones and Louise Minchin present the weekday magazine show featuring a mixture of topical discussion and expert advice for viewers

programme.title: Crimewatch Live
programme.desc: Rav Wilding and Steph McGovern reveal how an ex-prisoner who sought revenge against a guard over a petty grudge was caught. Police appeal for information on the murder of Michelle Bettles, who was killed in 2002

programme.title: Homes Under the Hammer
programme.desc: In Hampshire, Jacqui Joseph visits a flat in Southsea with an interesting staircase, while Martin Roberts is in sought-after town of Cheltenham in Gloucestershire, and in Bishops Stortford in Hertfordshire, where his colourful shirt makes up for the lack of colour in a two-bedroom flat

programme.title: Bargain Hunt
programme.desc: Roo Irvine hosts as two teams go head to head in Greyabbey, Co Down. They are assisted in their endeavours by experts Caroline Hawley and Thomas Forrester. Along the way, Roo gets behind the wheel of a DeLorean DMC-12, the car that famously featured as a time machine in the 1985 hit movie Back to the Future. Built on the peace line in Northern Ireland, the DMC-12s design was ahead of its time with its angular, stainless steel bodywork and eye-catching gull wing doors. At the Ulster Transport Museum Roo meets two men who test-drove the first cars to come off the production line

programme.title: BBC News at One; Weather
programme.desc: A round-up of the latest headlines

programme.title: BBC News at One; Weather
programme.desc: A round-up of the latest headlines

programme.title: Trace, Track, Get My Car Back
programme.desc: Trackers Neil and Jason snatch back a hire car that the customer is refusing to return. But when they search the vehicle, they make a shocking discovery

programme.title: Lost and Found in the Lakes
programme.desc: The metal detecting team are desperate to find a treasured heirloom for a heartbroken family - lost at an ancient stone circle just north of the Lake District. Crafter Lucy tackles some rubbish, while social media detective Mui hopes to get a lost possession back on its owners wrist

programme.title: Escape to the Country
programme.desc: Sonali Shah helps a couple from an English coastal town find their dream country escape in Perth and Kinross with a budget of £425,000

programme.title: The Repair Shop
programme.desc: Richard Talman and Sonnaz Nooranvary restore a ring thats missing its original onyx stone, bought for owner Zelda by her father when she was a teenager and toy restorers Julie Tatchell and Amanda Middleditch repair a severely cracked mechanical doll. Art conservator Lucia Scalisi and textile conservator Rebecca Bissonnet join forces to fix a banner for a jazz band from the 1920s and Will Kirk repairs a handmade wooden whirligig

programme.title: The Inner Circle
programme.desc: Amanda Holden hosts the quiz show where players must outsmart each other to win big. Six players are each randomly assigned a secret amount, which could be anything from zero to £4,000, before being thrown into a battle of wits, nerve and strategic gameplay across a series of challenging rounds

programme.title: Pointless
programme.desc: Alexander Armstrong is joined by co-host Judi Love for the quiz where contestants try to score as few points as possible. As ever, players attempt to come up with the answers no one else could think of

programme.title: BBC News at Six; Weather
programme.desc: The latest headlines

programme.title: The One Show
programme.desc: Clara Amfo and Alex Jones present the magazine show, with celebrity guests and stories of interest from around the UK

programme.title: EastEnders
programme.desc: The events of the accident play on Nigels mind, and Julie attempts to conceal the truth. Meanwhile, Kat follows Zoe to a clandestine meet with a private investigator to confront her about the stolen money

programme.title: The Repair Shop
programme.desc: Textile conservator Rebecca Bissonnet faces the challenge of restoring a Manchester United football shirt worn by a Busby Babe in the 1958 FA Cup final, while bookbinder Chris Shaw works delicately to preserve the battered pages and weathered covers of a Bible from a wartime internment camp. Munwar Hussain arrives with a beautiful but damaged Punjabi hookah once belonging to his grandfather, and brother and sister David and Lee from Huddersfield present an extraordinary automaton - a miniature watchmaker at work in his shop

programme.title: The Celebrity Traitors
programme.desc: As the game continues, the question on everyones lips is which celebrity was murdered, and could it lead them to a traitor? With the players growing frustrated, the mission only makes them feel even more trapped in the game and, as evening descends, the round table brings a fractious atmosphere - but will it conclude with a traitor being unveiled or lead to the loss of an innocent faithful? Hosted by Claudia Winkleman

programme.title: BBC News at Ten
programme.desc: A round-up of todays headlines

programme.title: Nolan Live
programme.desc: Stephen Nolan probes the issues that matter to the people of Northern Ireland, focusing on the stories of the week and the people making the headlines in lively debates, with viewers sending in their questions via text, email and social media

programme.title: MOTD: UEFA Champions League
programme.desc: Action from the matchday three fixtures in the league phase, including Chelsea v Ajax at Stamford Bridge, Eintracht Frankfurt v Liverpool at Deutsche Bank Park, and Monaco v Tottenham Hotspur at Stade Louis II. While Spurs went into their match boasting an unbeaten record following an opening victory over Villarreal followed by a draw away to Bodø/Glimt, Chelsea and Liverpool each had a record of one win and one loss from their two previous games

programme.title: The Weakest Link
programme.desc: Eight celebrities who were voted off first in previous episodes are given a chance to redeem themselves and win £50,000 for charity. Susie McCabe, Joel Corry, Tim Vine, Konan, Donna Preston, Helen Flanagan, Linda Robson and Danny John-Jules take part. Romesh Ranganathan hosts

programme.title: BBC News
programme.desc: A round-up of the latest headlines

programme.title: BBC News

programme.title: Breakfast
programme.desc: A round-up of national and international news, plus current affairs, arts and entertainment, and weather

programme.title: Morning Live
programme.desc: Gethin Jones and Kym Marsh present the weekday magazine show featuring a mixture of topical discussion and expert advice for viewers

programme.title: Crimewatch Live
programme.desc: Presenters Rav Wilding and Steph McGovern reveal how a fraudster who conned luxury hotels into buying Scottish tea was apprehended and sent to prison. They also talk to a mother whose son died riding on an e-scooter

programme.title: Homes Under the Hammer
programme.desc: The three properties being bought in this edition feature family partnerships - a husband, wife and daughter team in Madeley, Shropshire, brothers-in-law in Castleton, Derbyshire, and an entire family in Newton Aycliffe, Co Durham, get stuck in. All three renovations throw up unexpected issues, but will family harmony remain intact? Presented by Martin Roberts and Martel Maxwell

programme.title: Bargain Hunt
programme.desc: Eric Knowles presents the show from Ardingly in Sussex, where experts Raj Bisram and Nick Hall join the teams as they search for the best items to sell at auction in Newbury. Eric also brings along an unusual-looking antique and asks the fairgoers what they think it is

programme.title: BBC News at One; Weather
programme.desc: A round-up of the latest headlines

programme.title: BBC News at One; Weather
programme.desc: A round-up of the latest headlines

programme.title: Trace, Track, Get My Car Back
programme.desc: A family car fitted with a child seat is stolen off a driveway by car key burglars. As the thieves make their getaway, tracker Richard is alerted by the vehicles tiny tracking device and is quickly hot on their heels. However, theres a setback when the thieves find the cars tracker, realising its transmitting a GPS signal and that theyre being followed

programme.title: Lost and Found in the Lakes
programme.desc: All around the Lake District, the teams are hard at work searching for a lost possession thats been treasured for over 30 years. Crafter Sally tries to work her magic on some old ceramics rescued from the lake, while social media detective Mui strives to find a way to get a mini camera back to its owner

programme.title: Escape to the Country
programme.desc: Denise Nurse delivers the Peak District on a plate as she helps a couple from a town in Oxfordshire to find their dream country home for a budget of £450,000. While in the area, Denise also visits a family run hotel and restaurant, where she gets to sample some locally grown, seasonal delights

programme.title: The Repair Shop
programme.desc: Bookbinder Chris Shaw and art conservator Lucia Scalisi team up to repair a book made by two loving parents that charts the first three years of owner Lotties life. Dominic Chinea and Brenton West tackle the restoration of a paraffin camping stove bought in 1957 that comes with memories of family walking adventures and Will Kirk repairs a table bought in Thailand in the 1960s. Hatter Jayesh Vaghela fixes up a tweed flat cap for visitor Mick

programme.title: The Inner Circle
programme.desc: Amanda Holden hosts the quiz show where players must outsmart each other to win big. Six players are each randomly assigned a secret amount, anything between zero and £4,000. Each player only knows their own value before being thrown into a battle of wits, nerve, and strategic gameplay across a series of challenging rounds

programme.title: Pointless
programme.desc: Quiz show in which four pairs of contestants have to score the fewest points possible by giving the least obvious answers to questions posed to 100 people before the show. At the end of each round, the team with the most points is eliminated until the final two pairs battle for a cash prize. Presented by Alexander Armstrong and Judi Love

programme.title: BBC News at Six; Weather
programme.desc: The latest headlines

programme.title: The One Show
programme.desc: Lauren Laverne and Roman Kemp host the live magazine show featuring a mixture of celebrity chat and stories of interest

programme.title: EastEnders
programme.desc: Its tense between Kat and Zoe, but their attention soon turns to a cat trapped in the Vic. Zoe makes amends with her mum, but then drops a bombshell. Nigel is determined for the truth to come out, and Billy is irked when Johnny tries to win Lexis affection with gifts

programme.title: Dragons Den
programme.desc: A Newcastle-based wrestling enthusiast looks to Dragons Peter Jones, Deborah Meaden, Sara Davies, Steven Bartlett and Touker Suleyman to financially supplement his high-impact events business. A passionate Scottish entrepreneur showcases her line of natural tattoo aftercare products, an ed-tech innovator takes aim at the gaming generation with a platform that turns screen time into learning time, and two friends-turned-business partners pitch their safety-first flat-sharing app built on the power of mutual connections. Hosted by Evan Davis

programme.title: The Celebrity Traitors
programme.desc: As the players gather for breakfast, their focus is solely on the game and who they can - and more importantly cannot - trust. The games continue with a mission that requires the faithful to get into the minds of a traitor - though one wrong move could prove disastrous. Back at the castle, it remains to be seen whether the faithful have gathered credible leads to topple a traitor or risk being hoodwinked further away from the truth. Hosted by Claudia Winkleman

programme.title: BBC News at Ten
programme.desc: A round-up of todays headlines

programme.title: The View
programme.desc: Mark Carruthers reviews the weeks political news, including reports on the latest events at Stormont and Westminster. Plus, comment and analysis with studio guests

programme.title: Question Time
programme.desc: Fiona Bruce presents the topical debate, inviting a panel of politicians and other guests in Swindon to answer questions from an invited audience on subjects that have made the headlines over the past week

programme.title: Newscast
programme.desc: A panel of BBC journalists hosts a weekly round-up from Westminster, delivering the usual mix of serious analysis and light-hearted gossip about the biggest stories in politics. Laura Kuenssberg, Adam Fleming and Chris Mason are among the regular contributors

programme.title: Weather for the Week Ahead
programme.desc: A look ahead to the latest forecast

programme.title: BBC News
programme.desc: A round-up of the latest headlines

programme.title: Horrible Histories
programme.desc: Featuring Victorian fake news, paparazzi, and camera men strapped to the front of moving trains, Queen Victoria shows you how her subjects invented and became obsessed with films

programme.title: Horrible Histories
programme.desc: The Horrible History of dressing to kill. Henry VIII has beef over whose armour is best and Louis XV dresses as a hedge

programme.title: Joe Swash: Forgotten Young Dads
programme.desc: Joe meets young dads who are navigating the highs and lows of fatherhood, looking back on his own experiences as a parent and sparking wider conversations about masculinity, the importance of positive male role models, and why its time for young dads to be seen, heard, supported - and celebrated. Reflecting on how becoming a father in his mid-twenties changed his life, he meets four young dads who, like he once did, are navigating the challenges of parenting and are determined to challenge stigma, overcome hardship and redefine what fatherhood looks like today

programme.title: BBC New Comedy Awards
programme.desc: Sarah Keyworth hosts, as second heat contenders Eli Hart, Farhan Solo, Chloe Reynolds, Will BF and Monica Hsueh take to the stage of Birminghams Hockley Social Club in a bid to book their place in the final. Head judge Fatiha El-Ghorri is joined in her ranks by comedian, writer and podcaster Aurie Styla and local Brum stand-up Lindsey Santoro

programme.title: Film Club
programme.desc: Evie retreats to the safety of the garage, but with a new understanding, Suz and Izzie create a unique version of Film Club to bring back Evies smile

programme.title: Film Club
programme.desc: The day has finally come for Noa to leave, but Evie might not let him go that easily and it is not the only big decision she has to face

programme.title: The Boogeyman
programme.desc: A traumatised father turns up unexpectedly at the family home of a therapist in desperate need of help. His arrival heralds the emergence of a terrifying entity that feeds on human suffering and gleefully stalks children while disbelieving parents backs are turned. Psychological horror thriller, starring Madison Hu, David Dastmalchian, Cristala Carter and Shauna Rappold

programme.title: The Blair Witch Project
programme.desc: Three film students head into the American backwoods to make a documentary about the fabled Blair Witch. There proves to be more to the urban legend than meets the eye, and as night falls they find themselves in very real danger. Horror, presented as camcorder footage shot by the characters during their investigation, starring Heather Donahue, Michael Williams and Joshua Leonard

programme.title: Dreaming Whilst Black
programme.desc: Kwabena pulls out all the stops with an elaborate date to win Vanessa back, determined to remind her of what they once shared, and as they reminisce, old feelings resurface. Maurice and Funmis romantic night out falls apart when they cant find a babysitter, forcing them to improvise at home - quietly, cautiously, and with one ear on the baby monitor. Over dinner, Errol finally works up the courage to ask Grace a big question - until Claude and Polly swoop in and ruin the mood. Comedy, starring Adjani Salmon

programme.title: Dreaming Whilst Black
programme.desc: When network executive Pippa makes a surprise visit to the set of Sin and Subterfuge, Kwabena knows its his chance to prove he belongs in the directors chair. A flawless day could launch his career, but as one mishap spirals into another, he must rely on his charm and determination to keep the production afloat - and his dream within reach. When Maurice misses yet another nursery event for Mayowa, Funmi finds an unexpected ally in a fellow parent. Comedy, starring Adjani Salmon

programme.title: Dreaming Whilst Black
programme.desc: When the long-awaited chance to direct Jamaica Road finally arrives, Kwabena faces one final obstacle - he needs Simons help. Needless to say, getting his support comes with big strings attached. A run-in with Vanessa and her new boyfriend hits Kwabena like a ton of bricks. Maurice is blindsided when he learns that Mayowa has a girlfriend - something he knew nothing about. The revelation stings, forcing him to ask if the sacrifices hes making to fund his sons future are costing him the present. Comedy, starring Adjani Salmon

programme.title: BBC Comedy Short Films
programme.desc: Danielle Vitalis stars in in this comedy show exploring human exchanges and the funny unspoken rules of modern interaction. Sketches feature the driving instructor from hell, a trifling West Indian Judge and a Podcaster who will say sorry for anything if it means more money and more followers. With Vicki Pepperdine and Freddie Meredith

programme.title: Joe Swash: Forgotten Young Dads
programme.desc: Joe meets young dads who are navigating the highs and lows of fatherhood, looking back on his own experiences as a parent and sparking wider conversations about masculinity, the importance of positive male role models, and why its time for young dads to be seen, heard, supported - and celebrated. Reflecting on how becoming a father in his mid-twenties changed his life, he meets four young dads who, like he once did, are navigating the challenges of parenting and are determined to challenge stigma, overcome hardship and redefine what fatherhood looks like today

programme.title: Horrible Histories
programme.desc: History is filled with tales of great minds coming together, and collaborating, to achieve incredible things. Its also full of idiots working together to create an unholy mess and people forming partnerships for decidedly sinister reasons

programme.title: The Hit List
programme.desc: Music-loving friends Oli and Louise from Cardiff, father and daughter Peter and Carol-Ann from Derry and cousins Andrea and Gillian from Northampton compete in the music-based game show in which contestants must name as many hit songs and artists as possible, with a £10,000 jackpot up for grabs. Hosted by Marvin and Rochelle Humes

programme.title: Alan Carrs Picture Slam
programme.desc: Alan Carr hosts this game show in which three teams of contestants have to identify a board full of images, with a chance of winning up to £10,000 if they know them all. Taking part in this episode are mother-daughter duo Erin and Emma from Falkirk, friends Lil and Nick from Kent, and newly-married couple Ryan and Kin from Leicester.

programme.title: Point Break
programme.desc: An FBI agent infiltrates a Californian surfing gang suspected of carrying out a series of armed robberies wearing masks modelled on former US presidents. programme.title: Joe Swash: Forgotten Young Dads

Reflecting on how becoming a father in his mid-twenties changed his life, he meets four young dads who, like he once did, are navigating the challenges of parenting and are determined to challenge stigma, overcome hardship and redefine what fatherhood looks like today

programme.title: Top Gear
programme.desc: In an episode originally shown in 2011, Jeremy Clarkson celebrates the 50th anniversary of the Jaguar E-type by driving a modern-day interpretation of the classic sports car, and throws a typically low-key party involving live music, fighter planes and the Royal Marines. Richard Hammond is in South Africa, where he tests the Marauder, a bigger, more rugged alternative to the Humvee, and James May enlists the help of 2010 Winter Olympic skeleton gold medallist Amy Williams and former Intercontinental Rally Challenge champion Kris Meeke to try out a Mini rally car. programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.sub-title: The Name/The Extras/The Vacation/The Gripes/The Void/The Fraud/The Move/The Boss
programme.desc: When Mum reveals that Gumballs real name is Zach Gumball adopts a cheesy annoying persona to match the name. / Nothing much is happening for Gumball and Darwin and the background characters in Elmore seize their moment. / The Wattersons are swapping scary stories on a family vacation when their car breaks down in the middle of the desert. / Gumball is in such a bad mood that it spreads to Darwin who joins him in complaining about everything. / Gumball and Darwin start noticing small details around Elmore High that dont add up. / When Gumball and Darwin discover his diploma is fake Principal Brown is determined to keep their discovery a secret. / Gumball confronts Clayton about his fabled Seven Pressure Point Heart Exploding Technique assuming it’s another one of his outlandish claims. / Gumball and Darwin help Rocky land an office job so that his dad Mr Robinson will be proud of him.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.sub-title: The Allergy/The Mothers/The Password/The Procrastinators/The Shell/The Mirror
programme.desc: Darwin starts sneezing repeatedly and it seems he cant stop. / Its Mothers Day and Gumball and Darwin discover that Tobias and Banana Joe have both made a card for The Best Mum in the World. / Mum has forced Dad to install a password on the computer… / Gumball and Darwin are offended when Mom calls them “procrastinators” once she’s told them what it means. / While performing a school play Gumball is so nervous about kissing Penny that he accidentally head-butts her and cracks open her shell. / Gumball receives a scare-email from a freaky ghost and decides to ignore it despite Darwins advice.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.sub-title: The Burden/The Mirror/The Man/The Bros/The Lie/The Pizza/The Butterfly/The Question/The Oracle
programme.desc: Vice Principal Brown gives Gumball and Darwin the ancient school hamster Chris Morris to look after for the weekend. / Gumball receives a scare-email from a freaky ghost and decides to ignore it despite Darwins advice. / Granny Jojo has brought a boyfriend to her birthday meal and Dad isn’t happy about it. / When Darwin and Gumball reveal how they’d spend their perfect day Gumball confesses that he would spend it with Penny. / The citizens of Elmore are feeling down because it’s January so Gumball and Anais invent a new holiday called Sluzzle Tag. / The Wattersons complain about their day and order a pizza from Larry... / In Biology class Gumball and Darwin are waiting for a butterfly to emerge from its chrysalis. / After Gumball and Darwin have too much sugary cereal they begin thinking about the mysteries of the universe. / Gumball Darwin and Anais discover that Banana Joe’s mom paints pictures which predict the future.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: When Mr Small shows a health and safety video in class Darwin becomes obsessed with the idea of keeping the Wattersons safe. / Alan is so good-natured that Gumball feels compelled to make him lose his temper. / Anais throws a party but no-one shows up as she has no friends or social skills.

programme.title: The King of Queens
programme.desc: Doug learns Deacon has lied to his wife about a relationship with a female acquaintance, and Carrie questions her marriage due to her husbands views on cheating. Comedy, starring Kevin James, Leah Remini and Victor Williams

programme.title: The King of Queens
programme.desc: Deacon and Kellys separation makes Carrie wonder about her own marriage - and prompts her to devise a new method of resolving disputes with Doug. Meanwhile, Arthur dates a woman who claims she once went out with Frank Sinatra. Comedy, starring Kevin James, Jerry Stiller and Leah Remini

programme.title: Everybody Loves Raymond
programme.desc: Ray refuses to take Debra to an awards ceremony, tired of her constant lateness, while Frank and Robert get into their own heated debate about the importance of punctuality. American comedy, starring Ray Romano, Patricia Heaton, Peter Boyle and Doris Roberts

programme.title: Everybody Loves Raymond
programme.desc: Debra wants to buy an expensive dress for Ally to wear to a friends 13th birthday party, but Ray refuses to spend $250 on something that will only be used once, and naturally Marie takes his side. Comedy, starring Ray Romano, Patricia Heaton and Madylin Sweeten

programme.title: Everybody Loves Raymond
programme.desc: Robert contemplates leaving the police force to take up a job selling security systems, but the proposal receives a mixed reaction, leading to tense celebrations at his birthday party. Comedy, starring Ray Romano, Brad Garrett and Patricia Heaton

programme.title: Frasier
programme.desc: In this homage to the film Sliding Doors, two possible versions of the shrinks Valentines Day unfold - one in which a waitress captures his heart and one where he spends a lonely night at home. Comedy, starring Kelsey Grammer

programme.title: Frasier
programme.desc: Niles puts Daphne on a diet, unaware she has secret stashes of food hidden all over the place. Roz tries a new perfume guaranteed to have a devastating effect on men, while Frasier sets out to save station manager Kennys marriage - only to end up dating his wife

programme.title: Frasier
programme.desc: Niles attends a Seattle SuperSonics basketball game with Frasier, where he is plucked out of the crowd at random and offered a big cash prize to sink a half-court shot. David Hyde Pierce stars

programme.title: Frasier
programme.desc: Roz asks Frasier to narrate her documentary on the history of space travel - but he makes such a hash of it she ends up getting rid of him and recruiting former astronaut John Glenn instead. Meanwhile, Niles tries to relive his childhood by entering a kite-flying competition

programme.title: American Pickers
programme.desc: Mike Wolfe and Frank Fritz find a huge sculpture of Elvis and trawl through a trailer full of rare art and military memorabilia

programme.title: A New Life in the Sun
programme.desc: A Yorkshire entrepreneur is left high and dry while in Spain the hotel owners face personnel problems and repairs. In Italy a Manchester couple discover the perils of remote living

programme.title: Find It, Fix It, Flog It
programme.desc: Henry Cole and Simon OBrien head to the north of Wales where they meet Sue, who is clearing out her late husbands antique shop stock. Henry manages to find a pedal car, while Simon takes a toy yacht

programme.title: Countdown
programme.desc: Colin Murray and Rachel Riley host the long-running words-and-numbers game with Les Dennis joining Susie Dent in Dictionary Corner

programme.title: A Place in the Sun
programme.desc: Michael and his sister Catherine live many miles apart but theyre planning on seeing a lot more of each other as they pool their resources to buy a holiday home together. Theyve chosen Manilva on the Costa del Sol and need somewhere with enough space to share with their immediate families and wider family circle. For their budget of £175,000, Jean Johansson lines up five exciting options. Can she find their perfect holiday home in the sun?

programme.title: Help! We Bought a Village
programme.desc: In France, Justin and Mel find horses in their field and wasps in their attic and Robertos record-breaking bridge linking two ghost villages is almost ready to open. At Ben and Susanas Spanish hamlet, a cement truck gets stuck on the boggy road. And Normandy village owners Paul and Yip consider selling up

programme.title: Four in a Bed
programme.desc: The third visit of the week is to Bosham BandB in West Sussex. Alicia runs the business from her own home, where she applies some extra homely touches for her guests comfort. Unfortunately, the relaxed mood is pierced during evening drinks by an argument about online reviews

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Spiritual vegan Charlotte, so far known as the quiet one of the five in Cardiff - comes into her own with her confident hosting skills, and serves up a homely dinner. But then things turn a little spooky

programme.title: A Place in the Sun
programme.desc: Phil and Paula have always enjoyed holidaying in Spain and are now looking for their own holiday home in the north, largely as a base for their trips to see their beloved FC Barcelona. Laura Hamilton shows the couple what they can get for their budget of £160,000, from an apartment with the smallest sink in Spain to a place that has them moving in before theyve even seen all of it

programme.title: Channel 4 News
programme.desc: Including sport and weather

programme.title: Location, Location, Location
programme.desc: Kirstie Allsopp and Phil Spencer catch up with Rupreet and Sundeep who, in 2011, reached out for their help searching for their first home which had to be in a particular area of Harrow and near by to their own families. In 2021, Laura and Euan moved from Sydney back home to Glasgow so their children could be closer to their grandparents but after so long away they were torn between buying a flat in the trendy West End or moving a bit further out to get a larger family home. Kirstie and Phil catch up with the pair to see where they are now

programme.title: Grand Designs
programme.desc: Kevin McCloud follows a couple who face a race against time to realise their dream. Two years ago, corporate accountant Pep was diagnosed with terminal cancer. But rather than rest and avoid stress, Pep and partner Malene focused their attention on a long-held ambition to build a new house on their land in the Surrey Hills. The plan is to construct a modern take on a Viking hall, inspired by their love of all things Scandinavian and Malenes Danish heritage. But they must build quickly so Pep can enjoy what time she has left in the finished home

programme.title: New Zealands Best Homes with Phil Spencer
programme.desc: Phil returns to New Zealand for an intimate VIP tour of the countrys most exclusive and luxurious properties. He begins with three beachside homes in Whitianga, Pauanui and the Bay of Islands, including a gigantic property within an exclusive community that can sleep up to 22 people

programme.title: Britains Most Expensive Houses
programme.desc: Documentary going behind the scenes of top-tier estate agents across the UK as brokers try to seal deals on everything from Londons most coveted postcodes to grand country estates and coastal retreats. Leading broker Josh Marks digs deep into his network to sell an £80 million penthouse in Knightsbridge, Ian Lillicrap showcases two prime properties in Cornwall, including a £4 million coastal home with views of St Ives Bay, and Tim Phillips brings 20-acre Norfolk country estate Lynford Hall, built in 1856, to market

programme.title: Hunted
programme.desc: Two of the fugitives make an unexpected return to Stansted and come face to face with the ground hunters. In Ipswich, two runners are caught in the crosshairs as a hunter team closes in. Another fugitive makes the wrong call, thinking visiting home is a good idea

programme.title: Ramsays Hotel Hell
programme.desc: Gordon Ramsay checks in at the 90-year-old Monticello Hotel in Longview, Washington, where owner Phillip Lovingfoss has an apparent liking for alcohol that some of his staff claim is threatening to destroy the business. The challenge of turning around the hotels fortunes only increases when the chef sees shocking allegations about Phillip splashed all over the front page of the local newspaper

programme.title: Dispatches
programme.desc: Undercover report from an overstretched 999 control room. With services facing a record level of demand, the programme reveals how patients face dangerous delays and having to choose between waiting for an ambulance or risking making their own way to hospital. Some callers are told an ambulance is being arranged when staff are actually deciding whether they need one. Targets are routinely missed. As winter approaches, Dispatches asks whether the Government is doing enough to fix the crisis in emergency care

programme.title: Passing
programme.desc: Mixed race childhood friends Irene Redfield and Clare Bellew are reunited in middle-class adulthood in the 1920s. While Irene has married a respected black doctor called Brian in New York, Clare has chosen to pass as white to her circle of friends and her wealthy, racist husband. Historical drama, starring Tessa Thompson and Ruth Negga

programme.title: Come Dine with Me: The Professionals
programme.desc: Joint owners of BrewChimp Indian Social Club David and Raj are first to host in Manchester, hoping to wow their guests with their Indian tapas street food. Second hosts, owner Mark and head chef Dawn from the Wild West-themed Old School BBQ Bus, hope to tantalise with their Texan-themed menu. Alan and Michelle from One Plus Chinese Restaurant host the final night with yet another barbecue

programme.title: Kirstie and Phils Love It or List It
programme.desc: Phil Spencer travels back to Cambridgeshire to catch up with a couple he and Kirstie Allsopp first met three years ago when they were struggling with what to do with their three-bed semi. Amber Brammah, who was leading fitness classes from the garage, wanted a new house with more room to run her business, while ecologist husband Martin preferred the idea of renovating. Having made their decision, how have things changed in the 36 months since?

programme.title: The King of Queens
programme.desc: Doug lies to Carrie about working late so he can get out of a seminar and play mud football, but his escapade in the rain makes him so feverish that he has a nightmare about appearing in TV shows with Arthur. Comedy, starring Kevin James

programme.title: The King of Queens
programme.desc: Carrie wants Arthur to socialise more and encourages her father to attend an old peoples centre, which he hates. Doug takes pity on his father-in-law and takes him to a cocktail party instead - but ends up having to take sole responsibility for him. Kevin James stars

programme.title: The King of Queens
programme.desc: Doug feels unappreciated at work and aims to get a pay rise by claiming a major courier service wants to hire him - but he ends up getting sacked. Meanwhile, Carries enthusiasm for tanning lotion proves disastrous. With Lou Ferrigno, star of cult TV series The Incredible Hulk

programme.title: Everybody Loves Raymond
programme.desc: Ray is delighted to be awarded an honorary doctorate, but hurts Debras feelings by thanking everyone except her in his acceptance speech. He claims it was an accident, though she takes the opportunity to remind him of past snubs that were obviously deliberate

programme.title: Everybody Loves Raymond
programme.desc: Amys parents draw attention to Roberts strange eating habits, making him feel self-conscious every time he sits down for a meal - so Debra devises a plan to cure him once and for all. Ray Romano, Patricia Heaton and Brad Garrett star

programme.title: Everybody Loves Raymond

programme.title: Frasier

programme.desc: Self-important corkmaster Niles arranges a boycott of Frasiers new radio show on wine appreciation, while Martin struggles to escape the powerful clutches of his new physiotherapist - until he samples her delicious cooking. Kelsey Grammer and David Hyde Pierce star

programme.title: Frasier
programme.desc: Daphne breezes back into Niless life, sparking off an argument and casting a shadow over his chances of finding romantic fulfilment. Comedy, starring David Hyde Pierce and Jane Leeves

programme.desc: Daphne tries to convince Niles she is psychic, while Frasiers former college professor and mentor comes to visit, and immediately forms a romantic attachment with Roz. Comedy, guest starring Rene Auberjonois (Star Trek: Deep Space Nine), with Kelsey Grammer and David Hyde Pierce

programme.title: American Pickers

Plus, a lone mountain home features its own jailhouse, an underground bomb shelter and an awesome collection of Western ware

programme.title: A New Life in the Sun
programme.desc: In Italy, two Manchester foodies prepare a vegan banquet. In Greece, a London couple look to kick-start their food tours business. Meanwhile in Spain, there are more surprises for two Lincolnshire hoteliers, and a Yorkshire entrepreneur faces some life-changing decisions

programme.title: Find It, Fix It, Flog It

programme.title: Countdown
programme.desc: Colin Murray and Rachel Riley host the long-running words-and-numbers game with Les Dennis joining Susie Dent in Dictionary Corner

To also assist her with the search, Eileens brings along her daughter Khaya, who plans to visit regularly. Eileen ideally wants a two-bedroom apartment near the beach, and has a maximum budget of £43,500

programme.title: Help! We Bought a Village

Over in Spain, Ben and Susanas plans to convert a barn into more guest accommodation run into trouble

programme.title: Four in a Bed

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Fourth to host in Cardiff is IT consultant and part-time party boy David, who offers his guests a fully vegan dining experience. programme.title: A Place in the Sun
programme.desc: Sisters Ros and Elizabeth want to retire together to their dream home near Bergerac in France. The Dordogne is famous for its wine, warm summers, castles and green forests. Plus, on the banks of the river, Bergeracs old town offers charming cafes and shops for locals and tourists alike. Lee Juggurnauth shows Ros and Elizabeth five options for their maximum budget of £350,000, from a grand country home and picture-perfection to a place ticking boxes by the minute

programme.title: Channel 4 News
programme.desc: Including sport and weather

programme.title: George Clarkes Homes in the Wild
programme.desc: Just a stones throw from New Zealands Auckland City, George sets sail for Kawau Island - a boatlovers paradise where life is lived by the tides. With no roads and with complicated access, he explores a community that embraces true off-grid living. He pops in on an old friend to visit an architecturally designed boathouse with the waves lapping at its front door, and visits a stunning home crafted around a lifelong love of timber. He also discovers a one-of-a-kind yurt - a circular sanctuary full of character and creativity perched on craggy cliffs

programme.title: Taskmaster
programme.desc: The contestants are pushed to their limits as they try to pull off a heist, pay dubious homage to their heroes and shout about foodstuffs while wielding a mallet. programme.title: Car S.O.S.
programme.desc: Tim Shaw and Fuzz Townshend head off to Huddersfield, West Yorkshire, to rescue a 1992 VW Corrado, a German coupe that, in its time, was one of the fastest small family cars on the road. programme.desc: Darryl from Co Wicklow sets out to organise the perfect wedding for his childhood sweetheart Clodagh, and plans an outdoor reception in a home-made tipi decked with fairy lights

programme.title: Dont Tell the Bride
programme.desc: Adam is given £12,000 to plan every detail of his nuptials, and hopes to make up for past mistakes by giving his fiancee Lydia the wedding of her dreams. programme.title: Undercover Boss USA
programme.desc: Buffalo Wings and Rings president Nader Masadeh goes undercover to work in his own company to ensure his standards are being executed across the brand

programme.title: Ramsays Kitchen Nightmares USA
programme.desc: Gordon Ramsay heads to the coastal community of Long Beach, California, to save an Italian restaurant that was opened in 1958 and now under the misguided leadership of Nino, who blamed by brother Michael and sister Carina for the eaterys failings. Their 78-year-old mother Inge desperate for Nino to turn the business around, but the feuding family members will have to solve their differences first

programme.title: Ramsays Kitchen Nightmares USA
programme.desc: Gordon Ramsay continues his travels across America saving failing restaurants from disaster. In the first of two visits to Mill Street Bistro in Norwalk, Ohio, the chef encounters Joe Nagy, who claims he has the best menu from New York to Los Angeles. However, his servers and diners tell a different story, and his resistance to change leads to some explosive confrontations

programme.title: Ramsays Kitchen Nightmares USA
programme.desc: Gordon Ramsay heads to Brooklyn, New York, to tackle a 55-year-old family business. Owner John Esposito left school at the age of 14 and has worked at his parents restaurant, Sals Pizzeria, ever since. Their success meant they could afford to purchase the location next door in the 1990s, naming it Mama Maria after Johns mother, who died in 2002. But when he lost his father as well, John became overwhelmed by the responsibility of running both establishments and his livelihood is at risk

programme.title: Below Deck: Mediterranean

Can Gordon get this stubborn owner to finally accept his advice and secure the future of his restaurant?

programme.title: Couples Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Three couples from Plymouth compete for the £1,000 cash prize. Estate agent Paul and his wife Jo try to pull off an ambitious menu for the final meal of the week, but Paul must keep his nerves at bay as the pressure mounts

programme.title: Couples Come Dine with Me

programme.title: Dont Tell the Bride

programme.title: Dont Tell the Bride

programme.desc: Sarah from Plymouth becomes the first ever returning picker having previously been on the show as David. Now proudly pansexual and living as a woman, Sarah cant wait to road test her new body and hopes her first date as a woman will be everything she has dreamed of. Twenty year-old plumber Jamie from Swansea is fed up with being hit on by OAPs at work, he comes into the studio looking for love

programme.title: Below Deck Sailing Yacht
programme.desc: Gary asks Daisy a loaded question, while Diana re-evaluates her feelings, and another group of friends come aboard looking for an unforgettable experience

programme.title: Modern Family
programme.desc: Halloween-mad Claire is warned to tone down her horror hi-jinks this year, especially after almost giving a neighbour a heart attack 12 months ago - but when Phil decides to hold an open house to celebrate, she cant resist the urge to rustle up a few scares. Mitch and Cam are forced to deal with Lily when she asks about her real mum, while Jay and Manny learn that when a pregnant woman mentions her hormones, its best to take cover

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Marge is diagnosed with stress, so the decision is made to hire a nanny to help her cope with the domestic demands. Successful applicant Shary Bobbins bears a striking resemblance to Mary Poppins, and soon has Bart and Lisa doing chores - but the family starts to become too dependent on her

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: When Sheldon kicks Amy out of the apartment so that he can have some alone time to work, she and Leonard bond during a series of science experiments. Bert the geologist replaces Howard in his band Footprints on the Moon, and Sheldon finds Penny to be a surprising source of scientific inspiration. Laurie Metcalf and Brian Posehn guest star

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Raj finds himself in the middle of a domestic drama when he realises that the woman hes dating, Nell, has a husband, Oliver, who is very upset about their new relationship. Sheldon rents his old room back to have a quiet place to work and drives Leonard crazy by being a model tenant

programme.title: The Neighborhood
programme.desc: When Calvin and Daves college basketball teams face off, Dave surprises the Butlers with tickets to the game. He also invites one of his best friends from Michigan, Logan #2, who reveals to Calvin surprising new details about Dave

programme.title: The Neighborhood
programme.desc: When the Johnsons invite the Butlers to go camping, Dave is taken aback by Calvins idea of roughing it. Elsewhere, Gemma and Tina cross paths with Maynard, a general store proprietor who may not be as friendly as he seems

programme.title: The Neighborhood
programme.desc: When a curmudgeonly resident with few fans in the community passes away, the Butlers step up to host a memorial, leading Calvin to discover an unexpected revelation about himself

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: A chance to buy goods from the comfort of home

programme.title: 999 Rescue Squad
programme.desc: The medics spring into action when a cyclist plunges down a cliff after a freak accident. A homeowners booby trap - designed to deter burglars - sparks a major rescue operation

programme.title: 999 Rescue Squad
programme.desc: A landslip at a construction site traps a worker under tons of earth. Reports of a riot at a school come in and medic Alex must lead the operation to treat the injured

programme.title: 999 Rescue Squad
programme.desc: A car crash victim has to be put into an induced coma at the roadside. Andy is called in to stand by as bomb disposal experts deal with a mortar dating back to the Boer War

programme.title: 999 Rescue Squad
programme.desc: The response teams rush to save the life of a 21-year-old man who has been shot twice in the chest at a pub in Doncaster. Another man has a seizure high up in the cab of his tipper truck

programme.title: Expedition with Steve Backshall
programme.desc: The naturalist and explorer leads a team on a mission to summit a remote and unclimbed mountain in the Stauning Alps of Greenland, crossing a vast river and skiing across a glacier

programme.title: Expedition with Steve Backshall
programme.desc: Steve leads a cave-diving team into the largest unexplored cave network on Earth. Below the jungles of Mexico, they push further and deeper than anyone has gone before

programme.title: Expedition with Steve Backshall
programme.desc: Steve Backshall ventures into more uncharted territory in pursuit of new discoveries and world firsts. He begins by joining a team of world-class kayakers to head to Kamchatka to take on white-water in a bid to explore a wilderness packed with more brown bears than anywhere else

programme.title: Expedition with Steve Backshall
programme.desc: Steve joins forces with ropes expert Aldo Kane and Saudi Arabian geologists Mahmoud Al-Shanti and Hala Alwagdani to search for the longest lava tube in Arabia

programme.title: Great American Railroad Journeys
programme.desc: Michael Portillo travels from Reno, Nevada to Californias Napa County, taking to the skies over the Sierra Nevada mountain range and trying his hand at cowboy dressage

programme.title: Roman Holiday
programme.desc: A princess tires of a tour of European capitals and runs away from her entourage while in Rome. An American newspaper reporter takes her under his wing in the hope of getting an exclusive, but as he shows her the sights of the city, he starts to fall in love with her. Romantic comedy, starring Audrey Hepburn, Gregory Peck, Eddie Albert and Harcourt Williams

programme.title: Storm Over the Nile
programme.desc: A British Army officer resigns his commission on the eve of a campaign in Sudan to be with his fiancee. His comrades accuse him of cowardice, and when he learns his girlfriend thinks the same, he becomes determined to salvage his reputation. Disguised as an Arab, he finally has the chance to redeem himself when his friends are captured in battle. Period adventure based on The Four Feathers, with Laurence Harvey, Anthony Steel, Ronald Lewis and Mary Ure

programme.title: The Sound Barrier
programme.desc: An aircraft manufacturer risks alienating his friends and family in a single-minded attempt to prove planes can exceed the speed of sound. David Leans drama, written by Terence Rattigan and starring Ralph Richardson, Ann Todd, Nigel Patrick, Dinah Sheridan and Denholm Elliott

programme.title: Bridge of Spies
programme.desc: A lawyer in 1950s New York is hired to represent a Soviet spy in a showcase trial designed to demonstrate the fairness of the US justice system. In the face of public condemnation, he argues against the death penalty, a stance that years later leads to his involvement in an exchange of prisoners in East Germany. Steven Spielbergs fact-based Cold War drama, starring Tom Hanks and an Oscar-winning Mark Rylance

programme.title: Bullet Train
programme.desc: Unlucky US assassin Ladybug is given a simple mission - retrieve a metal briefcase on a high-speed train departing from Tokyo. The pick-up is too easy, but Ladybug discovers that four other killers are on board the same train, and that their missions have something in common. John Wick director David Leitchs comedy thriller, starring Brad Pitt, Joey King, Aaron Taylor-Johnson and Sandra Bullock

programme.title: Were All Going to the Worlds Fair
programme.desc: When a teen gets drawn into an online role-playing game, the lines between truth and fiction start to blur. Coming-of-age horror, starring Anna Cobb

programme.title: Kill List
programme.desc: A hitman with money worries is persuaded by his old partner to take on one last job. The duos mysterious client presents them with a list of three targets, but as they go about their deadly work, they start to realise there is something far more disturbing going on than a simple act of murder. Thriller, with Neil Maskell, Michael Smiley and MyAnna Buring

programme.title: Man in the Saddle
programme.desc: A wealthy and ambitious cattleman plans to seize all the land surrounding his own. A peaceful rancher living nearby ignores warnings to sell up and avoid a conflict, and as he suffers a campaign of intimidation, he is forced to adopt violent methods to defend his livelihood. Western, starring Randolph Scott, Alexander Knox, Joan Leslie and Ellen Drew

programme.title: San Demetrio London
programme.desc: A group of lowly British Merchant Navy sailors save the San Demetrio oil tanker after it was almost destroyed by the enemy, They brave fire and ocean to sail the the vessel 900 miles to the safety of a Scottish port. Drama, starring Walter Fitzgerald, Mervyn Johns and Gordon Jackson

programme.title: Three Hours to Kill
programme.desc: After being framed for murder and narrowly escaping the town mob, Jim Guthrie returns three years later to find the real killer. Western, starring Dana Andrews and Dianne Foster

programme.title: The Art of Racing in the Rain
programme.desc: Thanks to his race car driver owner, golden retriever Enzo learns that the techniques needed on the racetrack can also be used to successfully navigate the journey of life. Comedy drama, starring Milo Ventimiglia and Amanda Seyfried

programme.title: Hidden Figures
programme.desc: As the space race reaches fever pitch in the early 1960s, a trio of female African-American mathematicians attempt to overcome prejudice and find work with NASA. Their remarkable skills prove vital in getting an astronaut into orbit and bringing him safely back to Earth, but to realise their potential they must overcome deep-seated prejudice in the space programme and society as a whole. Fact-based drama, starring Taraji P Henson, Octavia Spencer, Janelle Monae and Kevin Costner

programme.title: Bloodshot
programme.desc: Marine Ray Garrison is shot dead during a mission but regains consciousness in Kuala Lumpur in the care of Dr Emil Harting. The medic brought Ray back to life using nanotechnology, augmenting the Marines strength, agility, speed and healing capabilities on the battlefield. Rechristened Bloodshot, Garrison wages top-secret war alongside other enhanced killing machines, while piecing together a conspiracy that robbed him of the woman he loved. Sci-fi thriller, starring Vin Diesel, Eiza Gonzalez and Guy Pearce

programme.title: Venom
programme.desc: While exploring space for new worlds, a probe belonging to the Life Foundation discovers a comet covered in symbiotic lifeforms. Following the probes return to Earth, journalist Eddie Brock investigates sinister trials being carried out by the corporation, and after being infected by an alien symbiote, develops superhuman strength and power. Fantasy adventure, starring Tom Hardy and Riz Ahmed

programme.title: Saint Maud
programme.desc: A nurse finds herself at a crossroads in both her personal life and career when a patient in her care dies after her attempts to give them CPR fail. She decides to make some wholesale changes, including becoming a devout Roman Catholic and even going so far as to change her name. She finds a job caring for a terminally ill atheist woman and resolves that her new mission in life is to not only provide palliative care her, but to also save her charges godless soul from an eternity with Satan. Horror, starring Morfydd Clark and Jennifer Ehle

programme.title: Tombstone Territory
programme.desc: After Clay kills a cattle baron who forced a gunfight, the people from the ranchers hometown plan to execute him for murder

programme.title: Cripple Creek
programme.desc: Two government agents travel to a frontier mining town to investigate a criminal conspiracy smuggling gold ore out of the country. They go undercover as infamous gunfighters to win the crooks confidence, but their arrival raises the local marshals suspicions. Western, starring George Montgomery and Karin Booth

programme.title: Tombstone Territory
programme.desc: Jimmy Edwards says nothing after witnessing the murder of a Mexican rancher and his foreman, and is then set up the take the fall for a robbery after his secret is figured out

programme.title: Tombstone Territory
programme.desc: Reverend Tuttle is aboard a stagecoach when it is robbed by three masked gunmen, and Hollister believes that Big Jim Sten and his men are the culprits

programme.title: Return of Sabata
programme.desc: A gadget-laden gunslinger rides into a small Texas town with his travelling circus, and runs into a man who owes him $5,000. But his efforts to get the money back lead him to fight to save the residents from a corrupt and greedy politician. Spaghetti Western, starring Lee Van Cleef, Reiner Schone and Giampiero Albertini also star. Dubbed in English

programme.title: The Persuaders!
programme.desc: Brett enters the world of espionage to expose a double agent, but learns too late that patriotism has its penalties. Vintage adventure series, starring Tony Curtis and Roger Moore

programme.title: The Avengers
programme.desc: Steed is invited to a party on an aeroplane with a motley crew. However, as the pilotless craft takes off, a voice tells them they are bound for a desert island where one will be revealed as a killer. Donald Sutherland, Charlotte Rampling and Brian Blessed guest star

programme.title: The New Avengers
programme.desc: Steed investigates a cunning plot to replace prominent figures with down-and-outs kidnapped from a hostel for the poor and needy, and brainwashed into doing their evil masters bidding. Patrick Macnee, Joanna Lumley and Gareth Hunt star

programme.title: The November Man
programme.desc: A retired CIA agent returns to duty to take on a personal mission, protecting a woman who has evidence that could expose a secret conspiracy. However, in the process he makes an enemy of his former protege and uncovers a mole within the intelligence agency. Thriller based on Bill Grangers novel There Are No Spies, starring Pierce Brosnan, Luke Bracey and Olga Kurylenko.

programme.desc: Joan bids a fond farewell to her friends at the hospital, but a last-minute intervention by her mother makes her reconsider her decision to leave. Meanwhile, Carnegie courts a wealthy patient in the hope of raising funds for the new hospital wing, and an alcoholic lets his family down at the worst possible moment. Hospital drama, starring Kananu Kirimi and Robert Cavanah

programme.title: Heartbeat
programme.desc: Aidensfield residents are shocked when an MI5 agent turns up in the village showing more than just a passing interest in the activities of Vernon Scripps and his mysterious associate, a man who disembarked from a Russian trawler docked in Whitby harbour. It seems there is an even darker side to the roguish wheeler-dealer than they suspected

programme.title: Heartbeat
programme.desc: Lord Ashfordlys staff come under suspicion when some African carvings are stolen from the hall - but then an African chieftain arrives claiming the very same pieces belong to his tribe. Vernon sees a business opportunity that needs the royal stamp of approval and probationary PC Tom Nicholson turns up at the station. Nostalgic drama, starring Jason Durr, Rupert Vansittart and Geoffrey Hughes

programme.title: Classic Emmerdale
programme.desc: Zak and Lisa finally give Sam their blessing, pleased to hear he has found somewhere to live. David is horrified to learn his dad is spending time with Val again.

programme.title: Classic Emmerdale
programme.desc: Sam decides to have a housewarming party - but things quickly get out of control. Marlon accidentally shares his frustrations about his marriage with the regulars of the Woolpack.

programme.title: Classic Coronation Street
programme.desc: Leanne feels guilty when she learns Roger has invested all his savings in the restaurant, while Ashley invites Casey for a drink. Joanne threatens Carla and Liam with a tribunal.

programme.title: Classic Coronation Street
programme.desc: Vernon prepares to jet off to Spain - so Liz makes a heartfelt plea for him to take her with him. Leanne turns to Carla for help again and Jason is unhappy to see Eileen with Pat.

programme.title: Downton Abbey
programme.desc: Its a happy day for Downton as Annas patience is rewarded, while Edith receives admiration from an unexpected quarter. Matthew refuses to back down over the estate management, but will his tactics pay off? Bransons plan for the christening causes consternation, as does the arrival of his brother, and OBriens motives are unclear as she counsels Thomas. Julian Fellowes period drama, starring Joanne Froggatt, Laura Carmichael, Dan Stevens and Allen Leech

programme.title: Doc Martin
programme.desc: Louisa and Martin search for a nursery now that Janice has left, and Mrs Tishell is shocked to find out that Al has very high blood pressure. Louisa also helps with the diagnosis of a pupil, which spurs her on to explore the possibilities of a change of career. This is not welcome news for Martin, who dislikes any kind of change, even if it could be for the better. Elsewhere, Ruth is approached about selling her farm. Starring Martin Clunes, Caroline Catz, Selina Cadell and Ian McNeice

programme.title: Heartbeat
programme.desc: A spate of petty thefts is traced to a local nursing home, but Blaketons investigations uncover something far more sinister. Meanwhile, Davids first day in his new job goes spectacularly wrong, but Bernie is not surprised. Rural drama, starring Jason Durr and Derek Fowlds

programme.title: Heartbeat
programme.desc: Ashfordly Hall throws open its doors to the public, but all hell breaks loose when a collection of valuable Constable sketches is stolen. Mike and Tom are sent to question the chief suspect, an 80-year-old art thief, only to find him mugged and bound to a chair - with none of the paintings anywhere in sight. Nostalgic drama, starring Jason Durr and Ryan Early

programme.title: Vera
programme.desc: A mother of two is found murdered in her back garden. Vera and Aiden investigate the case, and delve into the disturbing secrets and ongoing conflicts that lurk beneath the surface of the victims seemingly peaceful suburban community. The case takes a more complicated turn when the dead womans estranged family make an unexpected reappearance, and while several of her neighbours may have had cause to carry out a crime of passion, her relatives may have had compelling motives of their own to kill. Guest starring Rita Tushingham

programme.title: Lewis
programme.desc: The detective discovers his favourite 1970s band are on the verge of a comeback - along with their singer Esme Ford, who has made a shocking reappearance from beyond the grave, having faked her own death 35 years earlier. But when an orphan is found dead on the other side of town, a forensic link leads Lewis and Hathaway to suspect the aged rockers are somehow involved. Joanna Lumley, David Hayman, Simon Callow and Helen Baxendale guest star alongside Kevin Whately and Laurence Fox

programme.title: Wire in the Blood
programme.desc: Two successful career women are found raped and strangled in imitation of similar murders years earlier in continental Europe. Tony picks up the links with Bradfields own business community, but his investigations are interrupted by the unexpected arrival of teenage killer Jack Norton, who is on the run from his social workers because he cannot cope with life `released under licence"

programme.desc: Marlon apologises to Donna by cooking a romantic dinner - but its not long before the pair are arguing again. Sam sells his chickens in a bid to make it on his own.

programme.title: Classic Emmerdale
programme.desc: Jasmine follows Nicola to try and prove she is having an affair with David. Ross apologises to Marlon and Emily finds out about Laurels attempts at match-making.

programme.title: Classic Coronation Street
programme.desc: Casey visits to help Ashley cope in Claires absence, Leanne doesnt get off to a good start with her new agency chef and Sean pressurises Violet into taking a pregnancy test.

programme.title: Classic Coronation Street
programme.desc: Casey proves a big help to Ashley, so he invites her to stay for dinner. But then one thing leads to another. Leanne is annoyed when Paul criticises her food.

programme.title: Downton Abbey
programme.desc: There is excitement throughout the house and nearby village as the annual cricket match draws near, and the event brings out Roberts competitive side. Violets great-niece Rose arrives, but a trip to London reveals there is more to her than meets the eye, while Matthew and Mary seem to be keeping secrets from each other. Thomass future appears to be uncertain, but he may have found an unexpected ally in Bates

programme.title: Doc Martin
programme.desc: The curmudgeonly GP is perturbed when he discovers Louisa, who is already spending much of her time away from home, has applied to take up a child and adolescent counselling course. However, achieving a work-life balance is far from the greatest of concerns for some of the Ellinghams neighbours, not least of whom is Al, whose plans to demonstrate his business acumen are placed in jeopardy when Ken decides to close the pub. Unless Ruth agrees to serve as a guarantor, Ken will not allow Morwenna and Al to take over the establishment, so the pair arrange a race-walking event to raise funds and prove the community is on their side

programme.title: Heartbeat
programme.desc: A prodigal son returns to claim his inheritance, setting off alarm bells for Ventress, whose instinct is confirmed when a series of accidents at the carpet factory signals the managements scant regard for life and limb. Meanwhile, Vernon Scripps spies an opportunity to make merry as well as money by organising a beauty pageant, but reckons without the determined opposition of disapproving Joyce Jowett, who will stop at nothing to halt the event

programme.title: Heartbeat
programme.desc: Hippies colonise Lawsons holiday cottages, causing much local dissent and tut-tutting. The only people who dont object to their presence are an undercover journalist in search of a scoop, and Vernon, who is not slow to spot a way of capitalising on the situation. Starring Geoffrey Hughes and Malcolm Tierney

programme.title: Vera
programme.desc: The dead body of a teenage boy is found in a reservoir near a remote rural timber community. Vera and her team investigate, and discover that the boy had already been missing for three days prior to his death. However, the case is complicated by an apparent conspiracy of silence, as many of the townsfolk refuse to cooperate with the police investigation. A complex web of relationships between the victims friends and family slowly emerges, with many dark secrets that could have driven someone to kill

programme.title: Lewis
programme.desc: Feature-length episode. Chief Superintendent Jack Cornish goes missing and a recently embalmed body is discovered near an isolated farm track - could there be a link? As Hathaway goes on sabbatical in Kosovo, Lewis takes an awkward young constable under his wing to investigate the case. Guest starring Lucy Speed and Peter Davison, with Kevin Whately and Babou Ceesay

programme.title: Wire in the Blood
programme.desc: The suffocation of an elderly woman proves the prelude to a string of similar killings - and makes Tony wonder whether respected psychologist Jonathan Goode, one of his personal heroes, could be involved. Donatello (voiced by Micah Abbey), Leonardo (Nicolas Cantu), Michelangelo (Shamon Brown Jr) and Raphael (Brady Noon) experience the usual growing pains of teenagers while contending with the media spotlight. Building on their friendship with aspiring reporter April ONeil (Ayo Edebiri), the reptilian quartet face brilliant inventor Bishop (Alanna Ubach), who believes mutants are the greatest danger facing humankind and must be eliminated. programme.title: Antiques Road Trip

programme.title: Dog Squad
programme.desc: Dan the border collie is a search and rescue dog who works with his owner Jamie. His super nose follows scents and smells like clues so they can rescue people who need their help. Dan is busy digging a hole when his owner Jamie gets a very important phone call - police officer Penny needs them to go to Woofton Woods to look for a lost birdwatcher who is out trying to spot a rare bird, the Woofton woodpecker. After locating the birdwatchers car, Dan has to find the scent to discover which of the many paths she has taken through the woods. But the scent takes them off the path and into the canopy of trees, which are full of low-hanging branches and logs. Jamie kits Dan up with his breeze-busting bell so that he can hear him in the thicker forest. But after tracking down the lost birdwatcher, Dan and Jamie head back to the car park only to discover her car is still there. The birdwatcher has gone missing again! Can Dan and Jamie complete a double rescue?

programme.title: Dog Squad
programme.desc: Newfoundland Sylvie is a big therapy dog with big soft cuddles who loves to help people when theyre worried. She and her owner Katrina visit all sorts of people every day, young and old. Sylvie and her owner Katrina are helping a girl called Akilah, who is joining the local school after arriving from a foreign country. Lots of things will be very different for her, so Sylvie will need her super heart to make her feel as welcome as possible. After meeting Akilah and her mum, along with Fred the teaching assistant, Sylvie takes her to the school hall for some lunch, stopping to admire some artwork along the way. Then Sylvie acts as Akilahs furry tour guide on a whistlestop tour of the school, including a trip to the library, before guiding her to her new classroom to meet the teacher and all her new friends. There will be lots of new faces, and everyone will be talking in a language shes still learning - but with Sylvie and her super heart by her side, Akilah is sure to make lots of friends.

After this experience of a lifetime, its back to the water and a paddle to the stunning Kinnegoe Bay and the cliffs of Inishowen Head, before crossing Lough Foyle into Co Derry, where they visit the ruins of Saint Aidans church at Magilligan. programme.title: Grand Designs
programme.desc: Kevin McCloud returns to Cornwall to see former skydivers Leigh and Richards progress on the transformation of a derelict 17th century flour mill into a four storey, three-bedroom home. The pair fell in love with the building back in 2017 and put their lives on hold to move 250 miles to live in a caravan on site while they renovated the building, giving themselves just 12 months and a £250,000 budget. Once work began the true scale of the damage to the building was revealed and the couple were forced to pay out unexpected bills and take on a lot of the work load themselves. When the pandemic hit, the mission to finish the mill became an all-consuming affair but by January 2021 they still werent finished

programme.sub-title: Golden Days for Boys and Girls
programme.desc: The US drama returns for its fifth and final season, and the action has moved forward seven years to 1931 as the country struggles to cope with the Great Depression. With the end of Prohibition looming, Nucky looks to the future, forging an alliance with a liquor producer in Cuba. Margaret is now working on Wall Street, Lucky Luciano sets a bold plan in motion and Chalky seizes an opportunity to extricate himself from a difficult situation

programme.title: Boardwalk Empire
programme.desc: Nucky returns to Atlantic City following his dealings with a liquor producer in Cuba, only to be knocked back by a group of possible financiers. He turns to Tonino Sandrelli for help, and also gets in contact with Lansky and Luciano. Back in Chicago, Capones new enforcer Mike DAngelo puts the wheels in motion to recoup the money that was lost during a government raid - and Eli and Van Alden are tasked with the job. A series of flashbacks reveal a younger Nucky in 1884 as he comes to terms with his sisters death in the shadow of his fathers stand-off with the Commodore

programme.title: The Sopranos
programme.desc: Carmine Lupertazzi dies without naming a successor, presenting Johnny Sack with the opportunity to seize control in the New York organisation. Unfortunately, Lorraine Calluzzo fails to acknowledge his new-found power, prompting him to take extreme measures. She approaches Tony for help, and the Mob boss attempts to negotiate a power-sharing plan with Johnny. Gritty crime drama, starring James Gandolfini
